turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I need help finding a hotel for a trip next month. I'm looking for something in downtown Chicago for two nights, checking in on October 15th.

turns.speaker: agent

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Oh, right, checking out on October 17th then. And yes, a budget is crucial! I really need to find something under $200 per night before taxes. And if possible, somewhere with a nice view, but the budget is non-negotiable.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Understood. Finding hotels in downtown Chicago under $200 per night with a view for those dates can be challenging, as rates can be higher in October. turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ugh, that's annoying but okay, I get it. Yes, definitely prioritize the budget. Just show me what's available under $200, forget the view for now. I just need something clean and safe in a good location downtown.

turns.speaker: agent
